Gold.en: Hits three times with rising power.

Silver.en: Hits three times with rising power.

Crystal.en: Hits three times with rising power.

Ruby.en: Kicks the foe 3 times in a row with rising intensity.
Ruby.de: Tritt Gegner 3-mal nacheinander. Härte nimmt zu.

Sapphire.en: Kicks the foe 3 times in a row with rising intensity.
Sapphire.de: Tritt Gegner 3-mal nacheinander. Härte nimmt zu.

Emerald.en: Kicks the foe 3 times in a row with rising intensity.
Emerald.de: Tritt Gegner 3-mal nacheinander. Härte nimmt zu.

FireRed.en: A 3-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successive hit.
FireRed.de: Tritt Gegner 3-mal nacheinander. Die Härte der Tritte nimmt zu.

LeafGreen.en: A 3-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successive hit.
LeafGreen.de: Tritt Gegner 3-mal nacheinander. Die Härte der Tritte nimmt zu.

Diamond.en: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successive hit.
Diamond.de: Tritt Gegner 1- bis 3-mal nacheinander. Die Härte der Tritte nimmt von Treffer zu Treffer zu.

Pearl.en: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successive hit.
Pearl.de: Tritt Gegner 1- bis 3-mal nacheinander. Die Härte der Tritte nimmt von Treffer zu Treffer zu.
